body: Apparently we defaulted to TRACE logger level for v0.2.4, v0.2.5, v0.2.6 and v0.2.7 releases when using CMake. We default to INFO logger level when using autotools, since autotools doesn't set any and `logger.h` defaults to INFO if the level is undefined. There is also this gem which is completely incorrect, logger level won't be set to DEBUG in this case, it will default to whatever `logger.h` defaults to -- INFO. https://github.com/TokTok/c-toxcore/blob/36f0caaf072128623a4c70e6a614721249bb4c6b/configure.ac#L85 --- This change isâ€‚[](https://reviewable.io/reviews/toktok/c-toxcore/1212)

Right, it will fail to compile if user specifies the wrong logger level, but it's clearer if CMake catches that  before compiling and tells what the issue in plain English, rather than deciphering compile error. Also, how often are we planning on modifying the logger level enum anyway for it to be a burden?

```
$ cmake .. -DMIN_LOGGER_LEVEL=FOO
...
CMake Error at CMakeLists.txt:105 (message):
  Unknown value provided for MIN_LOGGER_LEVEL: "FOO", must be one of TRACE,
  DEBUG, INFO, WARNING or ERROR


-- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
```

There, added a small script that regexes out logger levels and diffs them.
Feel free to merge when ready.
Is ready, please merge. Just rebased on master. I can squash first two commits if desired. I'd like to keep the 2nd one and 3rd one separate though.

commit.message: Fix logger level defaulting to TRACE in CMake

verification.payload:
tree 5b052a029978d9185f98a1e258ec3502be5ce6dd
parent 5beb00c93d3adb5c23149535624d27c67bc146ea
author Maxim Biro <nurupo.contributions@gmail.com> 1538031083 -0400
committer Maxim Biro <nurupo.contributions@gmail.com> 1538939744 -0400

Fix logger level defaulting to TRACE in CMake

commit.message:
Default to not defining MIN_LOGGER_LEVEL in CMake

That way CMake's behavior matches what autotools does -- letting
toxcore/logger.h handle the default case.

verification.payload:
tree 5631d20eb74e06b57b752d9619d28cd552277b4b

author Maxim Biro <nurupo.contributions@gmail.com> 1538567357 -0400
committer Maxim Biro <nurupo.contributions@gmail.com> 1538939758 -0400

Default to not defining MIN_LOGGER_LEVEL in CMake

That way CMake's behavior matches what autotools does -- letting
toxcore/logger.h handle the default case.

commit.message: Make sure logger levels stay in sync across files

title: Fix logger level defaulting to TRACE in CMake
